mapper.select: SELECT id, status, note, date_modified, id_user FROM employment where id_user = #{id_user} order by date_modified desc;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO employment (status, note, date_modified, id_user) VALUES (#{status}, #{note}, #{date_modified}, #{id_user});
mapper.update: UPDATE employment set status = #{status}, note = #{note}, date_modified = #{date_modified} WHERE id = #{id}
